LanguageData.SK_Craftsmanship.label: Primary Craftsmanship
LanguageData.SK_Craftsmanship.description: You're not in stone age! Sit down and try to remember basics of your life before this catastrophe. Unlocks basic kitchen and production workbenches, some primal lightning and storages.
LanguageData.SK_Medicalcare.label: Medical care
LanguageData.SK_Medicalcare.description: New means to set up your medical area medieval style.
LanguageData.Pemmican.label: Pemmican
LanguageData.Pemmican.description: Make pemmican, a preserved mixture of meat and plant matter that doesn't go bad for a long time. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.PsychoidBrewing.label: psychoid brewing
LanguageData.PsychoidBrewing.description: With preparation, psychoid leaves can be boiled in water, producing a mildly euphoric and addictive tea.
LanguageData.EnthalpicCooling.label: Coldstone battery
LanguageData.EnthalpicCooling.description: Build an efficient passive cooling unit fueled coldstones.
